physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient is overweight, teeth in poor condition, face pallid, hair and clothing somewhat disheveled. Constant rocking movements noted. Patient was very shy and nervous during the interview. Spoke in a low and hesitant voice. Mental status: fully oriented to time and place, somewhat spotty memory of the past 42 years, able to do elementary arithmetic, good and appropriate vocabulary, made eye contact, showed appropriate affect, related well, and showed flashes of humor. Past delusions admitted, uncertainty regarding current status.
